column4: any ideas about this problem http://ubuntu.pastebin.com/453442
http://ubuntu.pastebin.com/453442 ffs does anyone know, could i even just get some recognition that i asked a question
what repo you getting skype fro?
try seveas' deb.  ask ubotu about skype
download it, then install with 'sudo dpkg -i <deb file>'
it seemsd the issue you were having is actually described on the wiki page ubotu linked to
i.e. the skype package doesn't list that qt one as a dependency
so you'd need to install that one manualy beforehand
or just use seveas' one, which i'd assume he'd set that dependency up for us
